section.title: Introduction
section.p: The news module provides a resoure type which displays a list of the document's children, in descending order of the creation date. The child documents are treated as news messages. The news can also be rendered as an RSS feed.

section.title: Formats
section.p: The news resource type provides the following formats:

dl.dd: The usual XHTML page. It shows a list of the child documents, including the title and first paragraph.

An XHTML snippet. The view is equal to the xhtml format, but the content is included in an <xhtml:div id="news"/> element. This format can be used to include the news items in other pages, typically using CInclude.
The RSS view of the news items.
The RSS header (<link rel="alternate" type="application/rss+xml" ... />), pointing to the RSS feed. This is used, e.g., for Firefox' "live bookmark" feature.
